about.title: About Me
about.description:
I fix things, build things, and sometimes refactor things just for fun.

Frontend-focused with a love for clean UI, reusable components, and efficient workflows — all while delivering smooth, user-friendly web experiences with React and Next.js. UI is my playground: SCSS, Tailwind, and Bootstrap.

The terminal feels like home — Linux, Git, and Neovim are my daily companions. Certified by HackerRank, FreeCodeCamp, Dicoding, and Google Cloud — so I’ve got the papers to back the pixels.

Open to frontend roles, freelance gigs, or any opportunity to contribute, grow, and build cool stuff.

Hire me — I ship fast, clean, and on point.

items.title: KubeShell7en
items.description: An open-source project for GNU/Linux environments, consisting of a set of widgets — such as bar, app launcher, notifications, media player, AI integration, control panel, shortcuts/devtools, and more.

items.title: My Personal Portfolio
items.description: A personal portfolio showcasing my works in a clean and interactive manner. This project serves as the main showcase to introduce who I am and what I build.

items.title: Treemap Diagram
items.description: An interactive treemap visualization to display hierarchical data in an intuitive and efficient way using nested rectangles.

items.title: Choropleth Map
items.description: An interactive choropleth map visualizing geographical data with color codes based on numerical values, facilitating spatial analysis.

items.title: HeatMap
items.description: Displays monthly global land surface temperature data from 1753 to 2015 in an interactive heatmap using D3.js.

items.title: Scatterplot Graph
items.description: An interactive scatterplot visualization using D3.js that shows relationships between variables in two-dimensional coordinates.

items.title: Bar Chart
items.description: An interactive visualization of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) using bar charts with D3.js. Includes tooltips with detailed information on hover.

items.title: 25 + 5 Clock
items.description: A Pomodoro-style timer built with React that alternates between work and break sessions. Users can adjust duration and control the timer.

items.title: JavaScript Calculator
items.description: A simple calculator built with React that supports basic arithmetic operations, input management, and decimal handling.

items.title: Drum Machine
items.description: A Drum Machine app that lets users play drum sounds via mouse click or keyboard. Features volume control and power toggle.

items.title: Markdown Previewer
items.description: A Markdown Previewer that lets users type Markdown and instantly view the rendered HTML output with syntax highlighting.

items.title: Random Quote Machine
items.description: A React app that displays random quotes from a public API with dynamic backgrounds, timer, and sharing options.

items.title: RPG Creature Search App
items.description: A Pokémon search app that allows users to search by name or ID and displays interactive information.

items.title: Cash Register
items.description: An interactive cash register app for selecting products, entering payment amount, and calculating change in detail.

items.title: Telephone Number Validator
items.description: A simple web app to validate US phone numbers based on common formats.

items.title: Roman Numeral Converter
items.description: A converter app that transforms decimal numbers (1–3999) into Roman numerals instantly.

items.title: Advanced Palindrome Checker
items.description: An interactive web app to check whether a word, phrase, or number is a palindrome, ignoring spaces, punctuation, and special characters.

items.title: Animation Company - Product Landing Page
items.description: A responsive landing page for a fictional animation company, built with HTML and CSS.

items.title: Technical Documentation Page
items.description: A simple and responsive technical documentation page built using HTML and external CSS.

items.title: Tribute Page
items.description: A simple and responsive tribute page built using HTML and CSS.

items.title: Survey Form
items.description: A responsive user experience survey form, built to gather feedback on website UI/UX.

items.title: My Old Portfolio
items.description: An early version of my personal portfolio. Built with basic web stack (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) as initial practice in UI and static site structure.

items.title: KubeShell7en (In Progress)
items.description: A desktop widget system for Linux using GTK4 and GJS for productivity tools.

items.title: To-Do List
items.description: A To-Do List app aimed at enhancing my backend skills, especially in building APIs, managing databases, and implementing user authentication.

Deepen understanding of CI/CD pipelines, containers, and deployment tools.
Learn Redux for scalable state management in large React applications.
Explore integrating language models into applications for smart assistant features.
